long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of AI with Extension | OS your AI Prompt Companion, the ultimate Chrome extension for integrating GPT (ChatGPT, Groq, Ollama, Llama, etc) capabilities directly into your browser. Enhance your productivity and creativity by seamlessly interacting with advanced AI models while you browse.

Features:
‚úÖ FREE Tier: Provides a FREE tier to test the product straightaway, and a PAID subscription for those who prefer a managed solution and higher limit per day.

üîê Bring Your Own Keys: The extension is open-source and provide integration with different providers and models. You're in control on how you use your data and have UNLIMITED access for personal use. BUSINESS with more than 5 people must purchase a license.

‚úèÔ∏è  Text Selection & Prompting: Select any text within your browser, choose from your predefined GPT prompts, and have the AI-generated output instantly copied to your clipboard.

üñ• Sidebar Output Display: View AI-generated content directly in a convenient sidebar. Interact with and utilise the output without leaving your current browser tab.

üìû Voice Interaction: Receive calls and engage in real-time conversations with a GPT agent that has been prompted beforehand, providing a hands-free AI experience.

üí¨ Customisable Prompts: Tailor your prompts to suit your specific needs and easily switch between them for various tasks and scenarios.

üîó Seamless Integration: Enjoy a smooth and intuitive interface that integrates effortlessly with your browsing experience, ensuring AI is always at your fingertips.

- Groq
- OpenAI

- Ollama (run you model locally!)


Whether you‚Äôre drafting emails, conducting research, or simply looking to boost your creativity, Extension | OS your AI Prompt Companion provides the tools you need to supercharge your workflow.
